listen backlog queue size: listen socket *BSD accept() filter ("httpready" or "dataready")Details
监听队列的大小: 监听套接字*BSD accept()过滤器（"httpready"或"dataready"）

listen backlog queue size: bind to the IPv6 socket
监听队列的大小: 绑定到IPv6套接字

listen backlog queue size: modules to load
监听队列的大小: 要加载的模块

listen backlog queue size: select stat() call caching
监听队列的大小: 选择stat()调用缓存

listen backlog queue size: enable core files
监听队列的大小: 启用核心文件

listen backlog queue size: stream request body to backend
监听队列的大小: 将请求的正文流式传输到后端

listen backlog queue size: stream response body to client
监听队列的大小: 将响应的正文流式传输到客户端

listen backlog queue size: default chunk buffer size, rounded up to nearest power-of-2 (default 8k; minimum 1k)
监听队列的大小: 默认块缓冲区大小，四舍五入到最接近的2的幂次方（默认8k；最小1k）

listen backlog queue size: limit the throughput for each single connection to the given limit in kbyte/s
监听队列的大小: 限制每个单独连接的吞吐量为给定的限制（以kbyte/s为单位）

listen backlog queue size: limit the throughput for all connections to the given limit in kbyte/s
监听队列的大小: 限制所有连接的吞吐量为给定的限制（以kbyte/s为单位）

listen backlog queue size: maximum connections
监听队列的大小: 最大连接数

listen backlog queue size: maximum number of file descriptors
监听队列的大小: 最大文件描述符数

listen backlog queue size: maximum number of seconds until a idling keep-alive connection is dropped
监听队列的大小: 等待保持活动连接超时的最大秒数

listen backlog queue size: maximum number of request within a keep-alive session
监听队列的大小: 保持活动会话内的最大请求数

listen backlog queue size: maximum number of seconds until a waiting, non keep-alive read times out and closes the connection
监听队列的大小: 等待的非保持活动读超时并关闭连接的最大秒数

listen backlog queue size: maximum size in kbytes of the request
监听队列的大小: 请求的最大大小（以kbytes为单位）

listen backlog queue size: maximum size of the request header fields (in bytes) (<= 65535)
监听队列的大小: 请求标头字段的最大大小（以字节为单位）（<= 65535）

listen backlog queue size: number of worker processes to spawn
监听队列的大小: 要生成的工作进程数

listen backlog queue size: maximum number of seconds until a waiting write call times out
监听队列的大小: 等待写调用超时的最大秒数

listen backlog queue size: allow to follow-symlinks
监听队列的大小: 允许跟随符号链接

listen backlog queue size: max (fuzzy) size of each temporary file (default: 1 MB)
监听队列的大小: 每个临时文件的最大（模糊）大小（默认：1 MB）

listen backlog queue size: Determines if inode-value is used in ETag generation
监听队列的大小: 确定在ETag生成中是否使用inode值

listen backlog queue size: Determines if mtime-value is used in ETag generation
监听队列的大小: 确定在ETag生成中是否使用mtime值

listen backlog queue size: Determines if size-value is used in ETag generation
监听队列的大小: 确定在ETag生成中是否使用size值
